TEST_NAME: Button labels should be unique per page
QUERY_CLOB:
with aapb as (select application_id, 
                     page_id, 
                     label, 
                     workspace,
                     last_updated_by,
                     last_updated_on,
                     build_option,
                     button_name,
                     button_id,
							       button_attributes,
                     dense_rank() over (partition by application_id, page_id, label order by button_id) therank
                from apex_application_page_buttons
						    where label not in ('Reset', 'Cancel', 'Save', 'Delete'))
select case when aapb.therank = 1
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       aapb.workspace,
       aapb.application_id, 
       aapb.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapb.last_updated_by,
       aapb.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is not unique [attributes : `%4`]', 
        p0 => aapb.button_name, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id,
        p3 => aapb.label,
				p4 => aapb.button_attributes) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Button `%0` (app %1, page %2) is not unique', 
        p0 => aapb.label, 
        p1 => aapb.application_id,
        p2 => aapb.page_id) issue_title,
       aapb.button_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapb.button_name,
       aapb.label,
			 aapb.button_attributes
from aapb
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapb.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapb.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapb.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapb.application_id
where aapb.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapb.therank = 2
EXPLANATION:
This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :
  1. 2.5.3(A) : Label in Name: For user interface components with labels that include text or images of text, the name contains the text that is presented visually.
  2. 3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions: Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
  3. 4.1.2(A) : Name, Role, Value : For all user interface components (including but not limited to: form elements, links and components generated by scripts), the name and role can be programmatically determined; states, properties, and values that can be set by the user can be programmatically set; and notification of changes to these items is available to user agents, including assistive technologies.
  4. 2.4.6(AA) : Headings and labels describe topic or purpose.
